From: "Benny Hillo" <teletran13@...>

Recon steps in front of burning hammer to protect perplex. "To get to 
perplex you'll have to destroy me first. But I warn you if you do you will 
be taken down with me. This is the the real Recon that stands before you. I 
am his guardian angel and I have taken on this form to fool you. And I warn 
you, the power of God shall always prefer," "Recon informed him, he reached 
behind his back and pulled out a solid, sterling silver staff with a 
crucifix on top. Then a bright light shown from behind the staff, almost 
blindingly bright.

>
>The crucifixes hit Burning Hammer.
>
>Burning Hammer: Ow! Damn it. I'm ingooooring you!
>
>Burning hammer rubbed his head where he was hit and walked toward Perplex,
>who just stood there.
>
>Burning Hammer: Here, kitty kitty kitty!...
>
